alert.note: Alert for Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 19 at 8:32PM MDT until May 20 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT FRIDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of mostly 2 to 5 inches, but up to 10 inches are possible in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elevations above 4000 feet in Fergus County. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact commutes both this evening and again on Friday morning. Hazardous backcountry conditions due to strong winds and wet snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
